required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Randomized, Double Masked, Clinical Study of Subjects With Dry Eye Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center, Phase 2a, Randomized, Double Masked, Clinical Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacodynamic Activity of ADX-102 Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With Dry Eye Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacodynamic activity of ADX-102 Ophthalmic Solutions and ADX-102 Ophthalmic Lipid Solution in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Assess safety and tolerability of ADX-102 formulations using adverse event query.
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the safety and tolerability of ADX-102 formulations in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of ADX-102 on ocular discomfort using the Ora Calibra® Ocular Discomfort scale.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the symptoms of ADX-102 on ocular discomfort in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of ADX-102 on dry eye syndrome symptoms using the Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) scale.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the dry eye symptoms of ADX-102 in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of ADX-102 on dry eye syndrome using the Ocular Surface and Disease Index (OSDI) © questionnaire.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the symptoms of ADX-102 in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of ADX-102 on tear film break-up time (TFBUT©).
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate tear film break-up time of ADX-102 in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of ADX-102 on fluorescein staining using the Ora Calibra® scale.
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate fluorescein staining of ADX-102 in subjects with dry eye syndrome.

intervention.description: ADX-102 Ophthalmic Solution (0.5%) administered for approximately 4 weeks.
ADX-102 Ophthalmic Solution (0.1%) administered for approximately 4 weeks.
ADX-102 Ophthalmic Lipid Solution administered for approximately 4 weeks.
